thread.title: Housekeeping walked in TWICE
thread.title_full: Housekeeping walked in TWICE - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: brandyn37
title: Housekeeping walked in TWICE
text: Housekeeping knocked once and then, less than 2 seconds later, walked into my room. Complained to management who assured me that it would handled. Later the same day, the EXACT SAME THING happened. Housekeeping knocked and walked right in. I stay in hotels for about 150 nights per year and have never had this happen before. Glad I wasn't coming out of the shower either time. Completely unacceptable, I will not stay here again and do not recommend this hotel
